name: IV - Keening Thunderhead Cut / Eviscerate God

system.description:
You sheathe your blade and then let tension rise.

Spend 1~3 Beats. Take on the Sheathed Stance until you attack. While in the stance, you have +1/+2/+3 Posture, and you can now teleport 2/3/4 when you rush, inflicting 1/2/3 Attack Dice on all enemies in burst 2 of you before the teleport when you do.

On your next riff, when you make an attack, you can instead, Unsheathe: attack all enemies in an area (blast 5/6/7) with Bravery + Faith+1/+2/+3, and blasting wide open. End your riff right after.
system.flavor: You let the tension rise, and the perfect slashing moment approaches, fulminates, echoes. All sound is dulled away, and the only thing you can hear is the screaming keening thunderhead as it reaches an unstoppable crescendo and you cut.
